data.text: @HullTruck So sorry to hear this; hope everyone has a full and speedy recovery
@miss1katy @HullTruck We're working our way through a LOT of emails but as soon as we get to yours you'll receive a confirmation email and then you should see the refund within a few days :)
@HullTruck Best wishes to everyone and speedy recoveries we were there in Saturday itâ€™s a fantastic performance I hope as many get to see it as possible
@dannimac25 @HullTruck :) thankyou!! Yeah I got the refund email through :) hopefully it will pop back into my account in the next few days?
@HullTruck Rest and recover. Fingers crossed for the rest of the run - this production deserves to be widely watched! x
@HullTruck So sorry everyone, rest up & get well soon💛

@miss1katy @HullTruck Hi Katy, if you've got an email on our system you'll receive one in the next few hours which gives you some options. If not, our team will give you a call. Thanks for your ongoing support! ')
